Public Class PaintEventArgs Inherits EventArgs Implements IDisposable
public ref class PaintEventArgs : EventArgs, IDisposable

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在重绘控件时发生事件。The event occurs when a control is redrawn. A指定要用于绘制控件和在其中进行绘画。A specifies the to use to paint the control and the in which to paint. 有关事件模型的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理事件以及如何使用类窗体上绘制矩形。The following example demonstrates handling the event and using the class to draw rectangles on the form. 和处理事件以确定矩形的大小。The and events are handled to determine the size of the rectangle. 该示例还演示方法要使之无效的矩形，导致进行重绘的区域。The example also demonstrates the method to invalidate the area of the rectangle, causing it to be redrawn. [!code-cpp[Demontrates Form Paint Event#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Demontrates Form Paint Event/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Demontrates Form Paint Event#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Demontrates Form Paint Event/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Demontrates Form Paint Event#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Demontrates Form Paint Event/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由标识`graphics`释放参数时已释放。The identified by the `graphics` parameter is disposed when the is disposed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在上绘制线条和文本控件。The following code examples draws lines and text on a control. [!code-cpp[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.Paint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.Paint/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后将其命名实例`Control1`并确保与事件处理程序事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#42](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#42)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#42)]

summary.span: 释放由 占用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 在垃圾回收将某一对象回收前允许该对象尝试释放资源并执行其他清理操作。

span.span: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
